name: INF394HNR304
body:
> The other metaphorical analogue to Godel's Theorem which I find provocative suggests that ultimately, we cannot understand our own minds/brains. - D. Hofstadter, GEB p.697 
***

This site is supplementary to INF394/HNR304 Humanity and the imagination - Computing the Beautiful, 2015 Fall, Northern Kentucky University.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
